title: Khaeltheron
description: A dark fantasy lore-first digital archive and worldbuilding showcase.
longDescription: Khaeltheron was designed as a story-driven web experience set in a dark fantasy atmosphere. The goal was to create a digital showcase for an expanding universe, acting more as a digital grimoire than a standard website. I architected the concept, narrative structure, visual flow, and end-to-end user experience, focusing on immersive lore and atmospheric UI. It serves as a technical study on how digital interfaces can evoke specific narrative moods.

title: The Grand Archive
description: An RPG-themed professional portfolio integrated with Gemini AI for a sentient-style experience.
longDescription: The Grand Archive (QA Forge) is a high-fidelity professional showcase designed to bridge the gap between technical QA engineering and creative game design. It features a custom RPG-inspired UI system, interactive 'Character Sheets' for technical skills, and a sentient AI companion, the 'Data Drake', powered by the Gemini API. The project demonstrates advanced React patterns, complex Tailwind styling, and seamless AI integration.

title: PonyFart
description: A playful experimental web game developed with a high-creativity vibe-coding approach.
longDescription: PonyFart is a fun-oriented web game developed using a 'vibecoding' approach. The project prioritizes rapid production, creative flow, and a humorous experience over rigid technical structures. It features browser-based gameplay with a focus on simple yet fluid input mechanics, serving as a playground for interactive web experiments and quick prototyping.
